comments.body:
shall we add a JIRA prefix?
```suggestion
  test("SPARK-32776: should not optimize away limit if streaming") {
```
can we add a test to check the nullability update?

A simple test case like here: https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/29053/commits/b454cd71fbd69bb0edf5113dbc0e72d70db5a6fd is ok? Or you want me to test that `UpdateAttributeNullability` kicks in and fixes some nullability after `PropagateEmptyRelation`?
